changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE phyto_taxon_changelog ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, taxon_name text, taxon_start_date date, first_occurrence date, parent_taxon_name text, training text, comments text, CONSTRAINT measurements_phyto_taxon_changelog_pkey PRIMARY KEY (measurement))

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW soop_auscpr_phyto_trajectory_map AS SELECT phyto.* , phyto_taxon_changelog.first_occurrence, phyto_taxon_changelog.parent_taxon_name, phyto_taxon_changelog.training, phyto_taxon_changelog.comments
from phyto LEFT JOIN phyto_taxon_changelog ON phyto.taxon_name = phyto_taxon_changelog.taxon_name order by trip_code,"TIME", measurement
